original_text: When God saw what they did, how they turned from their evil way, God relented of the disaster that he had said he would do to them, and he did not do it.
korean_text: 하나님이 그들이 행한 것 곧 그 악한 길에서 돌이켜 떠난 것을 보시고 하나님이 뜻을 돌이키사 그들에게 내리리라고 말씀하신 재앙을 내리지 아니하시니라

sentences.original_text: When God saw what they did
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그들이 행한 것을 보셨을 때

sentences.original_text: how they turned from their evil way
that he had said he would do to them
and he did not do it
